markdown:
<title level="1" pfs="Standard">[Changeling Exile](/Monsters.aspx?ID=79)</title>

<row gap="medium">

<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">

This changeling exile is the child of a night hag or dreamthief hag.

<column gap="tiny">
**[Recall Knowledge - Humanoid](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**
([Society](/Skills.aspx?ID=14)): DC 18

**[Unspecific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 16

**[Specific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 13
</column>

</column>

<column gap="medium">
<image src="/images/Monsters/Changeling_ChangelingExile.png" />
</column>

</row>

<title level="2" right="Creature 3">[Changeling Exile](/Monsters.aspx?ID=79)</title>

<traits>
<trait label="CN" url="/Rules.aspx?ID=95" />
<trait label="Medium" />
<trait label="Changeling" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=212" />
<trait label="Human" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=90" />
<trait label="Humanoid" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=91" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Bestiary](/Sources.aspx?ID=2) pg. 62</row>

**Perception** +11; darkvision

**Languages**
[Common](/Languages.aspx?ID=1), [Druidic](/Languages.aspx?ID=23)

**Skills**
[Deception](/Skills.aspx?ID=5) +9, [Medicine](/Skills.aspx?ID=9) +9, [Nature](/Skills.aspx?ID=10) +11, [Stealth](/Skills.aspx?ID=15) +8, [Survival](/Skills.aspx?ID=16) +9

<row gap="medium">
**Str** +4

**Dex** +1

**Con** +0

**Int** +0

**Wis** +4

**Cha** +2
</row>

**Items**
[Leather Armor](/Armor.aspx?ID=4)

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="medium">
**AC** 19 

**Fort** +7 

**Ref** +8 

**Will** +11 

+2 circumstance to all saves vs. dream and sleep
</row>

**HP** 45

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

**Speed** 25 feet

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
claws +11 ([Agile](/Traits.aspx?ID=170)),
**Damage** 1d4+4 slashing

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
staff +11 ([two-hand d8](/Traits.aspx?ID=198)),
**Damage** 1d4+4 bludgeoning

**Primal Prepared Spells** DC 21, attack +11
- **Cantrips (2nd)**
[Dancing Lights](/Spells.aspx?ID=58), [Produce Flame](/Spells.aspx?ID=236), [Read Aura](/Spells.aspx?ID=246), [Tanglefoot](/Spells.aspx?ID=330)
- **1st**
[Burning Hands](/Spells.aspx?ID=30), [Shillelagh](/Spells.aspx?ID=282), [Ventriloquism](/Spells.aspx?ID=356)
- **2nd**
[Darkness](/Spells.aspx?ID=59), [Humanoid Form](/Spells.aspx?ID=153)

**Druid Order Spells** DC 21
- **2nd**
[Wild Morph](/Spells.aspx?ID=480), [Wild Shape](/Spells.aspx?ID=481) (1 Focus Point)

</column>

<document level="2" id="creature-family-23" />
name: Changeling Exile
